definition.name: ContextMenu
definition.purpose: Provides a root context menu container for displaying contextual actions.
definition.description: A wrapper component for Radix UI's ContextMenuPrimitive.Root, used to create a context menu that can be triggered by user interaction (e.g., right-click). It passes all props to the underlying primitive and adds a data-slot for styling or testing.

initial.data: No menu is open by default.

when.description: User triggers the context menu (e.g., right-clicks on a target).

effects: Context menu appears at the cursor position or target element.

definition.visualLayout: Invisible container until triggered; then displays a floating menu.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI ContextMenuPrimitive.Root. Accepts all props supported by the primitive.

definition.name: ContextMenuTrigger
definition.purpose: Defines the element that triggers the context menu.
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI's ContextMenuPrimitive.Trigger. When the user interacts (e.g., right-clicks) with this element, the context menu opens.

when.description: User right-clicks or otherwise triggers the element.

definition.visualLayout: Renders its children as the trigger area.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI ContextMenuPrimitive.Trigger. Accepts all props supported by the primitive.

definition.name: ContextMenuGroup
definition.purpose: Groups multiple context menu items together.
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI's ContextMenuPrimitive.Group, used to visually and semantically group related menu items.

initial.data: Menu group is rendered as part of the menu.

definition.visualLayout: Renders a group of menu items together.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI ContextMenuPrimitive.Group. Accepts all props supported by the primitive.

definition.name: ContextMenuPortal
definition.purpose: Renders context menu content in a React portal.
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI's ContextMenuPrimitive.Portal, used to render context menu content outside the DOM hierarchy of the parent component.

initial.data: Portal is not visible until menu is open.

definition.visualLayout: No visible layout until used to render menu content.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI ContextMenuPrimitive.Portal. Accepts all props supported by the primitive.

definition.name: ContextMenuSub
definition.purpose: Provides a submenu within the context menu.
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI's ContextMenuPrimitive.Sub, used to create nested submenus inside a context menu.

when.description: User hovers or interacts with a submenu trigger.

effects: Submenu appears adjacent to the parent menu item.

definition.visualLayout: Renders a nested menu when triggered.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI ContextMenuPrimitive.Sub. Accepts all props supported by the primitive.

definition.name: ContextMenuRadioGroup
definition.purpose: Groups radio items in the context menu for exclusive selection.
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI's ContextMenuPrimitive.RadioGroup, allowing only one radio item to be selected at a time within the group.

initial.data: No radio item is selected by default.

from.state: No item or another item selected

effects: Only one radio item is selected at a time.

definition.visualLayout: Renders a group of radio menu items.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI ContextMenuPrimitive.RadioGroup. Accepts all props supported by the primitive.

definition.name: ContextMenuSubTrigger
definition.purpose: Triggers the display of a submenu in the context menu.
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI's ContextMenuPrimitive.SubTrigger, styled and enhanced to indicate a submenu. Displays a chevron icon and supports an 'inset' prop for indentation.

inset.description: Whether to add left padding for visual hierarchy.

visible: Submenu trigger element with chevron icon

when.description: User hovers or interacts with the submenu trigger.

effects: Submenu opens adjacent to the trigger.

definition.visualLayout: Menu item with optional indentation and a chevron icon.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI ContextMenuPrimitive.SubTrigger. Uses the 'cn' utility for className merging. Accepts an 'inset' prop.

definition.name: ContextMenuSubContent
definition.purpose: Displays the content of a submenu in the context menu.
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI's ContextMenuPrimitive.SubContent, styled for animation and positioning. Used to render the contents of a submenu.

initial.data: Submenu content is hidden by default.

effects: Submenu content is displayed with animation.

definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI ContextMenuPrimitive.SubContent. Uses the 'cn' utility for className merging.

definition.name: ContextMenuContent
definition.purpose: Displays the main content of the context menu.
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI's ContextMenuPrimitive.Content, rendered inside a Portal. Handles menu positioning, animation, and styling.

initial.data: Menu content is hidden by default.

effects: Menu content is displayed in a portal with animation.

definition.visualLayout: Floating menu content with animation and scroll support.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI ContextMenuPrimitive.Content inside a Portal. Uses the 'cn' utility for className merging.

definition.name: ContextMenuItem
definition.purpose: Represents a selectable item in the context menu.
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI's ContextMenuPrimitive.Item, styled for different variants (default, destructive) and supporting an 'inset' prop for indentation.

inset.description: Whether to add left padding for visual hierarchy.

variant.description: Visual style of the menu item.

initial.data: Menu item is rendered as part of the menu.

when.description: User hovers or clicks the menu item.

effects: Menu item is highlighted or triggers an action.

definition.visualLayout: Menu item with optional indentation and variant styling.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI ContextMenuPrimitive.Item. Uses the 'cn' utility for className merging. Supports 'inset' and 'variant' props.

definition.name: ContextMenuCheckboxItem
definition.purpose: Represents a checkbox item in the context menu.
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI's ContextMenuPrimitive.CheckboxItem, styled and enhanced to show a check icon when selected.

when.description: User clicks the checkbox item again.

definition.visualLayout: Menu item with a check icon when selected.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI ContextMenuPrimitive.CheckboxItem. Uses the 'cn' utility for className merging. Displays a check icon from lucide-react when checked.

definition.name: ContextMenuRadioItem
definition.purpose: Represents a radio item in the context menu.
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI's ContextMenuPrimitive.RadioItem, styled and enhanced to show a circle icon when selected.

initial.data: Radio item is not selected by default.

definition.visualLayout: Menu item with a circle icon when selected.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI ContextMenuPrimitive.RadioItem. Uses the 'cn' utility for className merging. Displays a circle icon from lucide-react when selected.

definition.name: ContextMenuLabel
definition.purpose: Displays a label within the context menu.
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI's ContextMenuPrimitive.Label, styled and supporting an 'inset' prop for indentation.

inset.description: Whether to add left padding for visual hierarchy.

initial.data: Label is rendered as part of the menu.

definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI ContextMenuPrimitive.Label. Uses the 'cn' utility for className merging. Supports an 'inset' prop.

definition.name: ContextMenuSeparator
definition.purpose: Displays a separator line between context menu items.
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI's ContextMenuPrimitive.Separator, styled for visual separation between menu sections.

initial.data: Separator is rendered as part of the menu.

definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI ContextMenuPrimitive.Separator. Uses the 'cn' utility for className merging.

definition.name: ContextMenuShortcut
definition.purpose: Displays a keyboard shortcut hint in the context menu.
definition.description: A styled span element for showing keyboard shortcut hints aligned to the right of a menu item.

initial.data: Shortcut is rendered as part of the menu item.

definition.visualLayout: Text hint aligned to the right of a menu item.
definition.implementationNotes: Renders a span with styling for shortcut hints. Uses the 'cn' utility for className merging.
